channel.title: blog on Julian Tang
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Julian Tang

item.title: First Post
item.description: So this is my very first blog post. To be honest I don’t really know what to write about for this post, so it’s going to be a short one. Also, I’m writing this prior to deploying this website, so if you’re reading this, it means I managed to avoid getting gapped by my deployment pipeline! Yippee! As I’ve said in my about section, this blog will pretty much be me spilling my thoughts onto the internet.
